definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[נקד]] ( √ of foll.; NH [[נׇקַד]] point, furnish with points; cf. Syr. nqaz (very rare) PS:2453; n. nuwqzo0 but also nuwqro0 point, mark; vbs. perh. denom.; Ar. naqat.a point or dot (letter, word, etc.), II. make specks, spots, on garment, etc., prob. loan-word Frä:195; Di:Lex. 648 cp. Eth. naqza: be decayed, worm-eaten (of wood, bread, etc.)).
